= Welcome to the memcached wiki =

The official memcached site is at http://www.danga.com/memcached

 * [http://www.socialtext.net/memcached/index.cgi?hackathon Hackathons] - Proposed dates and topics on the proposed hackathons are now posted. Also, find notes from previous hackathons.
 * [http://www.danga.com/memcached/download.bml Downloads]
 * [http://www.socialtext.net/memcached/index.cgi?clients Clients] - List of Client APIs in various languages
 * Ports

== FAQ / How To's / Tutorials ==

 * [FAQ] - We're starting a FAQ here
 * [http://www.socialtext.net/memcached/index.cgi?memcached_client_faq Memcached Client FAQ] - Questions and Answers specific to client authors and cross-compat client behavior.
 * [http://www.socialtext.net/memcached/index.cgi?sessions Sessions] - How to store sessions in memcached
 * [http://www.socialtext.net/memcached/index.cgi?this_is_a_story_of_cachingThis is a Story of Caching] - A tutorial in story form that may help you understand how to use memcached.
